targets.expr:
max by (ip,driver) (sum by (name, admin_name, ip, admin_desc, driver) (rate(solaris_exporter_diskio_usage_total{ip=~"${ip}",statistic="rlentime"}[${t}]))
/ ignoring (statistic,stat_desc) 
sum by (name, admin_name, ip, admin_desc, driver)
(rate(solaris_exporter_diskio_usage_total{ip=~"${ip}",statistic=~"reads|writes"}[${t}])>1))

max by (ip,driver) (sum by (name, admin_name, ip, admin_desc, driver) (rate(solaris_exporter_diskio_usage_total{ip=~"${ip}",statistic="wlentime"}[${t}]))
/ ignoring (statistic,stat_desc) 
sum by (name, admin_name, ip, admin_desc, driver)
(rate(solaris_exporter_diskio_usage_total{ip=~"${ip}",statistic=~"reads|writes"}[${t}])>1))

panels.title: Average transaction size per device over time period (${ip})

panels.description:
Number of bytes of successful reads and writes by CPU threads. 
A read can occur through the read, readv or pread system calls.
A write can occur through the write, writev, or pwrite system calls.
panels.title: Thread Reads/Writes ${ip}

panels.description:
Number of successful reads and writes by CPU threads. 
A read can occur through the read, readv or pread system calls.
A write can occur through the write, writev, or pwrite system calls.
panels.title: Thread Reads/Writes ${ip}

targets.expr: sum by (pset) (sum without (statistic) (rate(solaris_exporter_per_zone_usage_total{ip=~"${ip}", statistic=~"user|kernel"}[${t}])) *  ignoring(statistic,stat_desc) group_left solaris_exporter_per_zone_usage_total{ip=~"${ip}", statistic="cpus"})

avg by (pset) (solaris_exporter_per_zone_usage_total{ip=~"${ip}", statistic="cpus"}) - sum by (pset) (sum without (statistic) (rate(solaris_exporter_per_zone_usage_total{ip=~"${ip}", statistic=~"user|kernel"}[${t}])) *  ignoring(statistic,stat_desc) group_left solaris_exporter_per_zone_usage_total{ip=~"${ip}", statistic="cpus"})

avg by (pset) (solaris_exporter_per_zone_usage_total{ip=~"${ip}", statistic="cpus"}) - sum by (pset) (sum without (statistic) (rate(solaris_exporter_per_zone_usage_total{ip=~"${ip}", statistic=~"user|kernel"}[${t}])) *  ignoring(statistic,stat_desc) group_left solaris_exporter_per_zone_usage_total{ip=~"${ip}", statistic="cpus"})

topk(10, solaris_exporter_per_zone_caps_total{ip=~"${ip}", zone!="global", statistic=~"swap_usage.*"} / ignoring (statistic) solaris_exporter_per_zone_caps_total{ip=~"${ip}", zone!="global", statistic=~"swap_limit.*"} )
